title: 5067 Deephaven Ct
posting_body: Beautiful home in a great location!
Close to the airport, Rocky Mountain Arsenal hiking trails, shopping, parks, and schools!
All other utilities are paid by the tenant.
1 of the bathrooms is in the basement along with one of the bedrooms.
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, stove, oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave.
HEAT/COOLING: Central heat and AC (new as of 2021).
FENCING: 6 foot privacy fence in the backyard.
BASEMENT: Finished basement with bathroom attached to bedroom.
RESTRICTIONS: Pets are considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Please note HOA rules: All snow and ice must be removed from the sidewalk, trash cans must be behind the fence.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
